msbt.message: Hey, what're you starin' at? I know I ain't the best housekeeper, butEh, whatever. Just try an' make yourself at home, best you can.
Well, whaddaya think of my place? I'm no decoratin' wiz, but I at least like everything in here, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Havin' yourself a gander around my place? <20_3 arg="6" />Don't let me stop you, kiddo.<20_3 arg="3" /> Soak it all the way in, .

I refuse to compromise on sleepin' comfort. <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You can probably tell that from my . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Used to be I'd toss an' turn half the night. Now it's a quarter of the night at most, . Gahaha!
My television's kinda my roommate.Best kind of roommate too One that'll never talk back!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Music just plain sounds better on my <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Makes me sound like some kinda audio snob, but really I don't know anythin' about that stuff. Gahaha!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I see you admirin' my stylish .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Well, it's more'n just a timepiece I got it as a conversation piece.
They say your plants'll thrive if you talk to 'em a whole bunchTo see if it's true, I've been talkin' to my .Now that I said that out loud, it sounds kinda sad, .
I like to soak my achin' bones in my .Most days it really helps. And after a warm bath, chugging down a nice is just the best!
<20_2 arg="10" />My <20_2 arg="9" /> may not look like much, but it's really comfy. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You shouldn't judge by looks alone.
You know, chairs ain't just for sittin'.You can put things on 'em, or you can use 'em to reach high places. So they're both tool and furniture!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I don't actually know how to play my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />An old friend gave it to me and I don't want to toss it, so there it sits. Least it looks cool, right?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm not really even sure why I have my <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm not much of a chef, to be honest. I either burn or boil everythin' I eat.

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Uh, you weren't meant to see that I've been meanin' to get rid of it.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I picked it up because I was plannin' to get fit, but never found the time.
I like bein' outdoors where I can gaze up at the sky and think.<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Guess that's why I picked up my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Haven't actually used it yet, though.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I got some real nice lighting in here, huh? Probably on account of that .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I like to keep it on at night too.Not because I'm scared of the dark! It's, uhto make sure the dark ain't scared of ME! Yeahthat works

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Checkin' out my fancy , eh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Yep, takin' the time to take care of yourself is always worth it. And that thing sure helps. So I spend an hour or two gussyin' myself up every mornin'. So what? It ain't like I got a job!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />YepI reckon that my goes great in here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I spent way too long lookin' for one that'd match the room just right, y'see?And now it just sits there, emptier'n an empty can of . Gahaha!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wanna hear somethin' funny about my little pal there? It absolutely adores music. Any kind of music.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Doesn't matter if it's or . If I put a song on, that critter starts dancin', .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Gazin' over at my finned friend, huh? I adore watchin' it cut through the water. Reminds me of a younger me.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I don't do a lot of swimmin' these days, but that little fella does plenty enough for both of us, .

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I hope you're not about to ask me to tell you about that painting there.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The simple truth is, I don't know fine art from tart. I just like the color, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ah! That sure is quite , eh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I've had to move it around a bunch though. Seein' that just as I'm comin' out of a bad dream? Not fun!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh! I see you're over there admirin' my .Well, let me be the first to tell you that it's a fake, but that doesn't bother me a whit, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />So what if whoever made it didn't give a flying fandoodle about art? I say even fake art is still art.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I don't know why I put off settin' up my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />A breeze through a window is nice, but there's days I need somethin' with a lot more vim, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I must've wasted whole days starin' at my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The other day I was watchin' it do what it does, and before I knew it Wait, what day is it, ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I know what you're thinkin', and yes. That most certainly IS a photo of yours truly, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's a good photo, and having it there gives me something to aim for when I'm gettin' ready in the morning.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Used to be I couldn't stop playin' with my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But these days it feels like the dust in here gets a lot more playtime than I do, . Oh well!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You havin' a gander at my ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I tell ya, I don't think I've ever been so frustrated just tryin' to figure out how to play with something.Then again, I do keep tryin'. Reckon that means I'm having at least a little fun, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Y'know, at first I really didn't want .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now I can't imagine this place without! Just helps it all scream "" a bit louder.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Feels like I've spent weeks just readin' manuals since I got my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />So far, I'm up to the bit about the "on" button. That warranty was a real page-turner though, !

You wouldn't believe how much my life's been changed since I got my . You warm your hands with somethin' ONCE and suddenly they feel cold all th' time! I mean, c'mon, hands! I can't spend the rest of my life warming you! Toughen up, ya mitt-wits!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Eyein' my poster, huh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Let me tell ya, the artist who made that was pesterin' me for a solid week to pose for him, .Why any artist would wanna make a poster of this crusty ol' is anyone's guess, but what a result!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Y'know, I really wasn't sure about using album covers for art.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now that I see it though, it sure makes a lot of sense, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I never thought I'd be the type to want a flower for a roommate.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But then that amazin' smell hit my nostrils, and What can I say, kiddo? I'm smitten, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Sometimes when I've got a lot on my noggin, I'll put on what I call my thinkin' .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Then the REAL thinkin' startsoften with me asking myself why I've got my on.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Some clothes are just more fun to look at than to wear. Case in point— my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If there's a finer example of wearable art, I ain't seen it. But for wearin'? Nah! Too itchy, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Be careful not to trip over my , kiddo.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Footwear makes for fine decoratin', but you gotta be real careful walking around. Especially at night
